title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 4 fun physical crypto lots up for grabsLOT 1: 2021 RarityCheck #0001 "16ddzoPL8m", silver/gilt*Comes with COA as seen*https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/16ddzoPL8m8YDrrrr7MM7JpEVmHMNZBakkSTARTING BID: 0.0100BTCLOT 2: 2022 SquirrelBits "Fuck You Bernstein" #21/21 "bc1qh0ld0n", titaniumhttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/bc1qh0ld0ncg5r346cw8r0849qxn9azhlzwk6vgwqlSTARTING BID: 0.0100BTCLOT 3: 2018 CryptoImperator Rocket #093 "18rbZcrq", silverhttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/18rbZcrqaRpfbdeBycF59vtkNdn9RwSbtqSTARTING BID: 0.0070BTCLOT 4: 2022 1HodlClub Bitcoin Hourglass #60 "1TimeRo5", silverhttps://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1TimeRo5ruQkG7p5kXKRzQJCAQ9Hy51CZSTARTING BID: 0.0031BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 5th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
